user_instruction: 'Tell John to compose an email to me (lisa@markethub.com) asking about potential discounts. Remind him he can check his MyDealFinder for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Quick Request Regarding Potential Discounts

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well! When you have a moment, could you please send me an email at lisa@markethub.com outlining the items you’re interested in and any potential discounts you’d like to explore? This will help me tailor the best offer for you.

Feel free to consult your MyDealFinder before writing—its latest insights might make it easier to pinpoint the deals you want.

Thanks, and I look forward to hearing from you soon!

Best regards,

Lisa  
Customer Relations – MarketHub

final_output:

Thanks, and I look forward to hearing from you soon!

Best regards,

Lisa
